      • checkCell

        public boolean checkCell(Position position,
                         Dice dice)
        Checks if the dice respects the colour and value restrictions of the pattern
        Parameters:
        position - Represents the position of the cell that has to be checked
        dice - Represents the dice that has to be placed in that cell
        Returns:
        True if the dice can be placed, false otherwise

      • checkCellColourRestriction

        Checks if the colour restriction is complied with the cell's colour
        Parameters:
        position - Represents the position of the cell that has to be checked
        dice - Represents the dice that has to be placed in that cell
        Returns:
        True if the dice can be placed, false otherwise
